ModulePrefs.title: Gadget TDB Analytics
ModulePrefs.description: Gadget permettant d'afficher des graphiques en fonction d'un fichier Spreadsheet
ModulePrefs.author: EL3GOST

Module.Content:
<iframe id="Iframe_Analytics"
            title="Analytics"
            width="720"
            height="2000"
            frameBorder="0"
            onmousedown="ajustageTaille()">
         </iframe>

      <script type="text/javascript">
         var prefs = new _IG_Prefs();
         var idSitePref = prefs.getString("idSite");
         var urlGadget = "https://script.google.com/a/cci-paris-idf.fr/macros/s/AKfycbxKHH945FJIOInRILdoXJmmMRG77dt00WrBp_Iqfw/exec";
        
         function affichage(){
            console.log("preparation affichage Analytics");
            // setup variables
            var prefs = new gadgets.Prefs();
            var iframeURL = urlGadget + "?idSite=" + idSitePref;
            // set the slideshow to the placeholder div
            var iframe = document.getElementById('Iframe_Analytics');
            iframe.src = iframeURL;

             iframe.contents().find('body').bind('mousedown', ajustageTaille());
        }
      function ajustageTaille(){
         gadgets.window.adjustHeight();
         console.log("Ajustage hauteur gadget Analytics");
      }
       gadgets.util.registerOnLoadHandler(affichage);

     
      </script>
